Source.Name: paintown
Source.Summary: A 2D fighting game in the same style as Double Dragon and TMNT
Streets of Rage benzeri 2 boyutlu dövüş oyunu
Source.Description: Paintown is an open source fighting game in the same genre as Streets of Rage and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
Paintown, Streets of Rage ve Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles gibi oyunlara benzer açık kaynaklı bir dövüş oyunudur.

Source.Name: clementine
Source.Summary: A cross-platform music player based on Amarok 1.4
Source.Description: Clementine is a modern music player and library organiser. Clementine is a port of Amarok 1.4, with some features rewritten to take advantage of Qt4.
Clementine, Amarok 1.4 esas alınarak Qt4 ile yeniden yazılmış modern bir müzik oynatıcıdır.

Source.Name: sparklemedia
Source.Summary: KDE için Gstreamer tabanlı medya oynatıcı
Source.Description: Sparkle Media is a player-manager application for KDE4 using GStreamer instead of KDE-Phonon.
Sparkle Media, KDE-Phonon alt yapısı yerine Gstreamer kullanan bir KDE medya oynatıcısıdır.

Source.Name: waheela
Source.Description: Waheela is a program that offers you a party mode for Amarok2. It's a similar to kirocker, but it's a kde4 program. It supports themes and gives you the possibility to look the player with a password.
Waheela, KDE4 için Kirocker benzeri bir Amarok2 ara yüzüdür. Tema desteği ve oynatıcıyı şifre ile açma gibi özellikleri ile tam ekran bir oynatıcı sağlar.

Source.Name: cuberok
Source.Description: Cuberok is a lightweight music player based on Qt4. It has music collection support, music autorating, Last.FM scrobbler, ability to download images for albums and artists from Last.FM, tag editing capability and more.

Cuberok, Qt4 tabanlı hafif bir müzik çalıcısıdır. Müzik kolleksiyonu, Last.FM'e şarkı gönderme, Last.FM üzerinden albüm/sanatçısı bilgisi alabilme, otomatik puanlama, tag düzeltme gibi özelliklere sahiptir.

Update.Comment: -Command line options -Hotkeys for common actions -New backend: FFmpeg -Bookmarks for often used folders
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump: -First start wizard. It can import amarok database or create a collection -Scrobbler for Libre.FM -Import collection from Amarok 1.4 sqlite database. -Collection settings: functions for rescan and cleanup collection. -Information panel improvements. You can choose information you wanna see. -Bugfixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: comicmaster
Source.Summary: A CBR/CBZ reader for comic archives
Source.Description: ComicMaster is a CBR/CBZ reader for comic archives. It is able to open CBR and CBZ archives and display image contents. It allows you to add and remove single images, reorder images, and rename images in archives.
ComicMaster, CBR/CBZ formatındaki çizgi romanları görüntüleyebilir; Bu dosyalara, resim ekleme, resimlere yeniden sıralandırma, isim değiştirme gibi işlemlere izin verir.

Source.Name: luminance
Source.Summary: A graphical tool for creating and tone-mapping HDR images
Source.Description: Luminance HDR is a graphical program for assembling bracketed photos into High Dynamic Range (HDR) images. It also provides a number of tone-mapping operators for creating low dynamic range versions of HDR images.

Update.Comment: Bump to svn snapshot of new beta: - The name is Luminance HDR now, add Replace/Conflicts tags - Add new dependency gsl, fix paths and docdir
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Stable bump: -Add icon tag, and translations.xml -Better summary and description -Add a str-fmt patch -Fix dependecies for 2009, add libgomp and ilmbase direct dependecies -Add optional dependecy of hugin to use align_image_stack tool
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump and fixed CVE-2007-2956 from upstream.
Update.Name: Mustafa Günay

Source.Name: screenie
Source.Description: Screenie is a small tool to compose fancy and stylish screenshots.

Update.Comment: First release. (Initial release by H. İbrahim Güngör)
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: pencil
Source.Summary: Geleneksel el çizimleri için animasyon uygulaması
Source.Description: Pencil is an animation/drawing software for Mac OS X, Windows, and Linux. It lets you create traditional hand-drawn animation (cartoon) using both bitmap and vector graphics.
Pencil açık kaynaklı bir animasyon/çizim uygulamasıdır. Bitmap ve vektörel grafiklerle geleneksel el çizimleri ile animasyonlar yapmanıza olanak tanır.

Source.Name: printoxx
Source.Summary: Print your photos in your special layout
Source.Description: Printoxx is a program for printing one or more image files with a user-defined page layout. Images can be added to a layout page using the mouse to select and drop into place. Images can be moved around and resized using the mouse. Adding text (titles, notes) works the same way.

Printoxx ile birden çok resmi, istediğiniz şekilde özelleştirerek yazdırabilirsiniz. Sadece fareyi kullanarak resimleri sürükleyebilir, yeniden boyutlandırabilir, çevirebilir ya da resimlere metin ekleyebilirsiniz.

Source.Name: fotowall
Source.Summary: Fun tool for creating wallpapers with your pictures
Kendi resimlerinizden eğlenceli duvar kağıtları yapın
Source.Description: FotoWall is a creative tool that allows you to layout your photos or pictures in a personal way. You can add pictures, then resize, move, change colors, text, shadows, etc.

FotoWall ile kendi seçtiğiniz resimler ya da fotoğraflar ile boyutlandırma, taşıma, renklendirme, metin/gölge ekleme gibi bir çok özelliği kullanarak, kolayca size özel duvar kağıtları hazırlayabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump, drop upstreamed patch, fix homepage
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump, mimetype support is really working now
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: pencil
Source.Summary: Geleneksel el çizimleri için animasyon uygulaması
Source.Description: Pencil is an animation/drawing software for Mac OS X, Windows, and Linux. It lets you create traditional hand-drawn animation (cartoon) using both bitmap and vector graphics.
Pencil açık kaynaklı bir animasyon/çizim uygulamasıdır. Bitmap ve vektörel grafiklerle geleneksel el çizimleri ile animasyonlar yapmanıza olanak tanır.

Source.Name: converseen
Source.Summary: An easy to use image batch converter and thumbnail creator
Kullanışlı bir toplu resim dönüştürme ve önizleme oluşturma aracı
Source.Description: Converseen is a project written in C++ with Qt4 libraries. It supports more than 100 image formats. You can convert an unlimited number of images and / or create thumbnails to any of the most popular formats: DPX, EXR, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PDF, PhotoCD, PNG, Postscript, SVG, and TIFF.

Converseen, 100'den fazla grafik formatını destekleyen bir Qt4 uygulamasıdır. DPX, EXR, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PDF, PhotoCD, PNG, Postscript, SVG, ve TIFF formatları arasında dönüştürme yapmanızı ve/veya önizleme resimleri oluşturmanızı sağlar.

Source.Name: kamoso
Source.Summary: Take pictures and videos out of your webcam
Source.Description: Kamoso is an application to take pictures and videos out of your webcam. It also lets you to push the media to some web 2.0 services such as facebook and youtube.
Kamoso ile web kameranızla video ve fotoğraf çekebilir, çektiğiniz fotoğrafları facebook ve youtube gibi servislerde paylaşabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: ming
Source.Summary: A library for Flash movie generation
Flash film oluşturmak için bir kitaplık
Source.Description: Ming is a library for generating Macromedia Flash files (.swf), written in C, and includes useful utilities for working with .swf files.
Ming, Macromedia Flash dosyaları (.swf) oluşturmak için C ile yazılmış bir kitaplıktır. .swf dosyaları ile çalışmak için gerekli pek çok kullanışlı araç içerir.

Update.Comment: First release. (Initial release by Eren Türkay)
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: gimp_scripts_26
Source.Summary: A collection of scripts for use in the GIMP 2.6
Source.Description: GIMP-2.6 scripts is a fixed/hacked collection of scripts for use in the GIMP 2.6. Originally for 2.4, but things continue to evolve and break scripts.
Gimp 2.6 için derlenmiş bazı betikler. Bazı Gimp 2.4 betiklerinin yeniden düzenlenmiş ve güncellenmiş sürümlerini içerir.

Source.Name: kstreamripper
Source.Summary: A KDE program for ripping internet radios
İnternet radyolarından kayıt yapabilen bir KDE uygulaması
Source.Description: KStreamRipper is a KDE program for ripping internet radios. It is based on StreamRipper.
KStreamRipper, internet yayını yapan radyolardan kayıt yapabilen ve StreamRipper altyapısını kullanan bir KDE uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: imagination
Source.Description: Imagination is a lightweight and simple DVD slide show maker written in C language and built with the GTK+2 toolkit.
Imagination, kullanışlı ve basit bir DVD slayt oluşturma uygulamasıdır. GTK+2 araç takımı kullanılarak C ile yazılmıştır.

Update.Comment: First release. (Initial release by Eren Türkay)
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: 2mandvd
Source.Description: 2ManDVD is a tool for generating video DVDs, it is the successor of ManDVD
2ManDVD video DVD'ler oluşturmak için bir araçtır. ManDVD projesine esas almıştır.

Source.Name: Miro
Source.Summary: Miro turns your computer into an internet TV
Source.Description: Miro is an Internet TV player with integrated RSS and BitTorrent functionality.
Miro, RSS ve BitTorrent destekli bir internet multimedya oynatıcısıdır.

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable, drop redundant patches, switch to gstreamer, add strict gst dependencies: -Support for subtitles -Launch any file in an external player -Make max volume 2x/3x -Allow for dragging/dropping items to video/audio/other tabs -Media controls to trayicon right-click menu -Support media keys -Dropped support for xine renderer -Lots of improvements, bug fixes and optimizations
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to bugfix release, add strict dependency to latest libtorrent to make Miro use system one
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: New bugfix release, fixes for: *Fullscreen does not work -> call_xss error *Youtube video downloads are stuck in starting up *Incorrect data expiration and other fixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Add patches to: *Disable autoupdates and Xine Hack *Fix broken Youtube thumbnails and debugging *Switch from Gstreamer to Xine for rendering, as gst is a bit buggy
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: New version: *Fixed issues that affected users with large databases *Added a dialog shows upgrading the database *Added an upstream patch to fix broken fullscreen usage
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to 2.5 stable, add notify-python support: *New audio podcast section of the Miro Guide *Better interface for audio playback *Smarter handling of bittorrent files, especially videos *New Library interface with ‘Video’, ‘Audio’, and ‘Other’ sections *New keyboard shortcuts for virtually all functions *Lots of bug fixes and tweaks
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to 2.5 rc1, fix dependencies, clean actions.py
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Add all direct dependencies, fix paths
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump and dodoc for needed files, remove unneeded patches and deps
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: *Version Bump to a new bugfix relase. *translations.xml and desktop.patch added for Turkish users.
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: cute-giraffe
Source.Description: Cute Giraffe is a video/audio/image codec which is designed initially as a GUI wrapper for ffmpeg but with great ambitions to provide advanced support for ffmpeg and other libraries.
Cute Giraffe ffmpeg kullanarak video/ses/resim dönüştürme işlemlerini yapabilen bir grafik arayüzdür.

Source.Name: qeven
Source.Description: "Qt Easy Video Encoder"(QEVEN) allows to encode for several video format (VCD, DVD, SVCD, DIVX, XVID, FLV). It was develop using Qt4 and C++. Using MEncoder and MPlayer.
QEVEN, bir çok video formatı arasında(VCD, DVD, SVCD, DIVX, XVID, FLV) dönüştürme yapar. Qt4 ve C++ ile yazılmıştır. MEncoder ve MPlayer altyapısını kullanır.

Source.Name: radiotray
Source.Summary: Online radio player for system tray
Sistem tepsisi için çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısı
Source.Description: Radio Tray is an online radio streaming player that runs on system tray. Its goal is to have the minimum interface possible, making it very straightforward to use.
Radio Tray, sistem tepsisine yerleşen çok sade bir arayüze sahip çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısıdır.

Source.Name: aarni
Source.Description: Aarni is a small and easy-to-use file encryptor. It's based on Qt4 and using AES-128 in the XTS mode to encrypt data.
Aarni, basit ve kolay kullanımlı bir dosya şifreleme aracıdır. Qt4 tabanlı olup şifreleme için XTS modunda AES-128 algoritmasını kullanır.

Source.Name: truecrypt
Source.Description: Free open-source disk encryption software for Windows Vista/XP, Mac OS X, and Linux.
Free open-source disk encryption software for Windows Vista/XP, Mac OS X, and Linux.

Source.Name: komparator4
Source.Summary: KDE application that searches and synchronizes two directories
Source.Description: Komparator is a KDE application that searches and synchronizes two directories

Update.Comment: Bump to KDE4 port, it's komparator4 now and using cmake, fix paths and homepage
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: q4wine
Source.Summary: Qt4 utility for management wine applications and prefixes
Wine ayarları için QT4 arayüzlü bir uygulaması
Source.Description: q4wine is an qt4 GUI for W.I.N.E. It will helps you to manage wine prefixes and installed applications.
q4wine, wine ile ilgili çeşitli ayarları yapmak için WineTools esas alınarak hazırlanmış bir Qt4 uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: screenshooter
Source.Description: ScreenShooter is an application to take a screenshot and share it with your friends. Just click "Screenshot" (or press F9), select an area and now you have the URL in your clipboard. Everyone who receives a link will be able to see your screenshot.

ScreenShooter, ekran görüntüsü yakalamayı ve paylaşmayı sağlayan bir uygulamadır. Paylaşmak istediğiniz alanı seçtiğiniz anda görüntünün yüklendiği adres,istediğiniz kişilerle paylaşmanız için panonuza kopyalanır.

Source.Name: kdocker
Source.Description: KDocker will help you dock any application into the system tray.
KDocker, sistem tepsisine yerleşme özelliği olmayan uygulamaları sistem tepsisine küçültmenizi sağlar.

Source.Name: synkron
Source.Description: Synkron is an application for folder synchronisation that allows you to configure your synchronisations in detail. Despite having many features, the user interface of Synkron is very user-friendly and easy to use.
Synkron, dizinlerinizi eşleştirmek için gelişmiş seçenekler sunan, kolay kullanımlı bir uygulamadır.

Source.Name: icoutils
Source.Summary: Set of program for extracting and converting images in Windows icon and cursor files
Source.Description: The icoutils are a set of program for extracting and converting images in Microsoft Windows(R) icon and cursor files. These files usually have the extension .ico or .cur, but they can also be embedded in executables and libraries (.dll-files).

Source.Name: whohas
Source.Summary: Which distribution has which version of what packages
Source.Description: whohas is a command line tool that allows querying several package lists at once - currently supported are Arch, Debian, Fedora, Gentoo, openSUSE, Slackware (and linuxpackages.net), Source Mage, Ubuntu, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Fink and MacPorts.

whohas, çeşitli dağıtımlar arasında pek çok paket hakkında sorgulama yapabilen bir konsol uygulamasıdır. Arch, Debian, Fedora, Gentoo, openSUSE, Slackware (ve linuxpackages.net), Source Mage, Ubuntu, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Fink ve MacPorts'u destekler.

Source.Name: zshdb
Source.Description: zshdb is a comprehensive source-code debugger for Zsh.

Source.Name: tktray
Source.Description: TkTray is an extension for managing system tray icons with Tk on X Window System.

Source.Name: qbzr
Source.Summary: Plugin with Qt GUI for Bazaar version control system
Bazaar versiyon kontrol sistemi için Qt arayüzüne sahip eklenti
Source.Description: QBzr is a cross-platform GUI front end for Bazaar, based on Qt toolkit. It provides many core bzr commands and several universal dialogs and helper commands.
QBzr, Qt araçları ile yazılmış çoklu platform destekli bir Bazaar arayüzüdür. Pek çok ana bzr işlevini ve yardım komutlarını destekler.

Source.Name: marave
Source.Summary: A text editor that helps you focus on writing
Source.Description: Marave is inspired by ommwriter and other similar projects, aims to be a simple, clean text editor that doesn't distract you from your writing.

Source.Name: plasmoid-kprayertime
Source.Description: Kprayertime, şık görünümlü bir namaz vakitleri programcığıdır.
Kprayertime is an islamic prayer times plasmoid with an innovative look.

Source.Name: plasmoid-discburner
Source.Description: DiscBurner is a disc burning plasmoid. It can create audio discs (bin, cd/dvd), mp3 discs (iso9660, cd/dvd) or data discs (iso9660, cd/dvd).
DiscBurner, K3B kullanarak CD/DVD yazma işlevlerini sunan bir DVD/CD yazma programcığıdır.

Source.Name: plasmoid-imdboid
Source.Description: IMDboid is a simple plasmoid querying IMDb for information on IMDb for a Movie.
IMDboid, istediğiniz filmin bilgisini IMDb veritabanından alan bir programcıktır.

Source.Name: kcometen4
Source.Summary: KDE için güzel bir ekran koruyucu
Source.Description: KCometen4 is an OpenGL KDE screensaver. Inside a box is a nifty light show that features lightning and exploding comets. It lets you configure various effects like comet behavior, camera movement, box face images, etc..
KCometen4 KDE4 için OpenGL destekli bir ekran koruyucusudur. Ayarlanabilir çeşitli ışık ve patlama efektleriyle, masaüstü görüntülerinizden oluşan bir küp içerisinde hareketli görüntüler sunar.

Source.Name: plasmoid-smooth-tasks
Source.Description: Smooth Tasks replacement has window peeking similar to Windows 7 when you use the kwin 'highlight window' effect. Even if this effect is not used you can click the tooltip in order to activate the corresponding window.
Smooth Tasks, Kwin efektleri açıkken Windows 7 görev çubuğundakine benzer pencere geçişleri sağlar. Kwin efektleri kapalıyken de çeşitli özellikleri ile kullanışlı bir görev yöneticisi sunar.

Source.Name: plasmoid-pirc
Source.Description: Pirc is an irc plasmoid
Pirc bir IRC programcığıdır

Source.Name: audiokonverter
Source.Summary: A small utility with KDE service menus to easily convert sound files
Ses dosyalarını dönüştürmek için KDE servis menüsü de içeren basit bir uygulama
Source.Description: Audiokonverter is a small utility to easily convert from OGG, MP3, AAC, M4A, FLAC, WMA, RealAudio, Musepack, Wavpack, WAV and movies to MP3, OGG, M4A, WAV and FLAC in file manager by right-clicking on them.

Audiokonverter ile dosyalar üzerine sağ tıklayarak; OGG, MP3, AAC, M4A, FLAC, WMA, RealAudio, Musepack, Wavpack, WAV arasında dönüştürme yapılabilir, video dosyalarını MP3, OGG, M4A, WAV and FLAC biçimlerine dönüştürebilirsiniz.

Source.Name: plasmoid-athkar
Source.Description: Athkar, belirli aralıklara wathakker.net'ten ya da yerel bir veritabanın dualar gösteren bir programcıktır.
Athkar is a plasmoid that display Islamic supplications every predetermined time from wathakker.net or local database.

Source.Name: plasmoid-fancy-tasks
Source.Description: Fancy Tasks plasmoid providing a fancy representation of your tasks and launchers for those who need full power of task manager and fresh look.
Fancy Tasks programcığı, güçlü bir görev yöneticisi sunarak çalışan uygulamalarınız ve uygulama başlatıcıları için kullanışlı ve süslü bir görünüm sağlar.

Source.Name: plasmoid-cwp
Source.Description: Cwp is another weather plasmoid. It aims to be highly customizable, but a little harder to setup than other weather plasmoids.
Cwp, diğer hava durumu programcıklarına kıyasla daha gelişmiş ve özelleştirilebilir bir hava durumu programcığıdır.

Source.Name: qgoogletranslate
Source.Description: qgoogletranslate translates text via Google Translate engine.
qgoogletranslate, Google Translator altyapısını kullanarak metinleri başka bir dile çevirir.

Source.Name: stardict-essential-kurdish
Source.Description: Stardict/Qstardict Kurdish dictionaries, including German, English, French, Arabic, Sorani and Swedish languages.
Almanca, İngilizce, Fransızca, Arapça, Soranice ve İsveççe çevirilerini içeren Kürtçe Stardict/Qstardict sözlükleri.

Source.Name: qtrans
Source.Summary: Another Qt dictionary application for KDE
Source.Description: QTrans is a word translator for KDE. It can use Babylon (*.dic, *.bgl), StarDict (*dict, *.dict.dz) and plain text (*dic.txt). To convert (*.bgl) dictionaries to plain text, dictconv can be used

Source.Name: mdicconv
Source.Summary: Convert dictionary files to each other
Source.Description: MDicConv is a small program to convert a dictionay file type in another dictionary file type.

Source.Name: astranslator
Source.Description: astranslator translates text via Google Translate engine.
astranslator, Google Translator altyapısını kullanarak metinleri başka bir dile çevirir.

Source.Name: mdic
Source.Summary: A complete Multilingual Dictionary for GNU/Linux
Source.Description: MDDic is a multilangual Qt4 dictionariy. It is is able to pronounce the words by default if espeak tool is installed, or if KDE text to speech configured properly. It can use different formats of dictionaries

Source.Name: zekr-trans
Source.Description: Various Translations for Zekr Open Source Quran study tool. Including; Spanish, Turkish, Brasilian, Russian, German, Dutch and Italian translations.

Source.Name: openbibleviewer
Source.Description: openBibleViewer is a QT4 based free program for the work with the bible.
openBibleViewer Qt4 tabanlı bir incil çalışma uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: taskcoach
Source.Description: Task Coach is a simple open source todo manager to manage personal tasks and todo lists.

Source.Name: griffith-extra-artwork
Source.Description: Griffith is a media collection manager application. Adding items to the collection is as quick and easy as typing the film title and selecting a supported source.
Griffith, filmlerinizi kolayca düzenleyebileceğiniz, desteklenen internet kaynaklarından güncelleyebileceğiniz kullanışlı bir koleksiyon yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: zekr
Source.Description: Zekr is an Open Source Quran study tool. This project is planned to be a universal, Open Source, and cross-platform application to perform most of the usual refers to the holy Quran.

Source.Name: griffith
Source.Description: Griffith is a media collection manager application. Adding items to the collection is as quick and easy as typing the film title and selecting a supported source.
Griffith, filmlerinizi kolayca düzenleyebileceğiniz, desteklenen internet kaynaklarından güncelleyebileceğiniz kullanışlı bir koleksiyon yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: openmolar
Source.Description: Openmolar is a Dental Practice Management Suite. Supports appointments, patient records, treatment planning, billing etc.
Openmolar, Diş Hekimliği uygulamalarının yönetimi için geliştirilmiş bir yazılımdır. Randevular, tedavi planlaması, faturalama, reçete düzenleme gibi pek çok özellik içerir.

Source.Name: audex
Source.Description: Audex is a audio grabber tool for CD-ROM drives based on KDE. It can creates profiles for LAME, OGG Vorbis (oggenc), FLAC, FAAC (AAC/MP4) and RIFF WAVE.
Audex, ses CD'lerini farklı formatlarda kaydetmenizi sağlayan bir KDE uygulamasıdır. LAME, OGG, Vorbis(oggenc), FLAC (AAC/MP4) ve RIFF WAVE formatlarını destekler.

Source.Name: usbmanager
Source.Summary: An application to manage USB storage devices
Source.Description: USBManager is a simple and intuitive tool developed to help managing USB storage devices on GNU/Linux.
USBManager, USB hafıza aygıtlarının yönetimi için geliştirilmiş basit ve kullanışlı bir uygulamadır.

Source.Name: mameexecutor
Source.Description: Mame Executor is a frontend for SDLMame that runs under KDE. The goal is to provide users with a convenient GUI to configure and launch SDLMame.
Mame Executor, KDE için kullanışlı ve gelişmiş ayarlara sahip bir SDLMame arayüzüdür.

Source.Name: touchfreeze
Source.Description: TouchFreeze docks in your system tray and disables button click events while typing.
TouchFreeze, sistem tepsisine yerleşerek, tek tıkla touchpadi açıp kapatmanızı sağlar.

Source.Name: synaptiks
Source.Description: Synaptiks is a touchpad management tool for KDE. It provides a simple configuration interface and can automatically switch off your touchpad on keyboard activity or if mouse devices are plugged.
Synaptiks, basit arayüzüyle, fareyi bilgisayara taktığınızda ya da klavyeyi kullandığınızda touchpadi kapatan bir KDE aracıdır.

Source.Name: rapid-down
Source.Summary: A Rapidshare downloader for premimum accounts
Rapidshare premium hesapları için indirme yöneticisi
Source.Description: Rapidshare Downloader is a simple application that allows you to download your files from Rapidshare.com. You must have Rapidshare.com premium account to use it.
Rapidshare Downloader, Rapidshare premium hesabınızı kullanarak kolayca dosya indirmenizi sağlayan bir Qt uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: oneclickftp
Source.Description: OneClickFTP is a FTP-Client written in C++/Qt4, with which you can Upload Files with just a few Clicks. To do that you have to specify Profiles with the Server, Username, Password an the desired Files.

Source.Name: qtm
Source.Summary: A blogging client which uses famous blogs' APIs
Bir çok internet günlüğü API'sini destekleyen bir günlük yönetim uygulaması
Source.Description: QTM is a blogging client which is presently capable of composing, formatting and submitting blog entries to a weblog. QTM will work with blogs based on most of the major blogging systems available today: Wordpress (including wordpress.com), Movable Type, Drupal and so on.

QTM, internet günlüğünüz için girdilerin düzenlenmesi, silinmesi veya eklenmesi için kullanabileceğiniz bir günlük istemcisidir. QTM, Wordpress, Movable Type, Drupal gibi bilinen pek çok günlük altyapısını destekler.

Source.Name: blogtk
Source.Summary: A PyGTK weblog client that allows you to post to your weblog
PyGTK arayüzüne sahip bir internet günlüğü uygulaması
Source.Description: BloGTK 2.0 is designed to make editing multiple blog accounts easy, it allows you to connect with many weblog systems such as Blogger, Movable Type, WordPress, and more.
BloGTK 2.0 ile Blogger, Movable Type ve WordPress tabanlı birden çok günlük hesabınızı yönetebilirsiniz.

Source.Name: arora
Source.Summary: A simple cross platform web browser
Çoklu platform destekli hafif bir web tarayıcı
Source.Description: Arora is a fast, easy QtWebkit based cross platform browser.
Arora QtWebkit tabanlı, çoklu platform destekli hızlı ve sade bir web tarayıcısıdır.

Update.Comment: Add netscape plugins path and imdb search
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bugfix release: - Fix build breakage due to final API changes in Qt 4.6.0 - A segfault that could occur when opening a URL on a new window from the command-line
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bugfix release: * Drop upstreamed patches - Fix crashes when using privacy mod - Fix "SSL handshake failure" bug and some other fixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Add two quick upstream patches for: - sites were showing a SSL handshake failure rather then prompting about - only tab down the completer when the popup is visible
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable * Drop upstreamed patches * Update Turkish locale - Add support for AdBlock - Support several common modifiers in the location bar for modifying the typed in url - Add Password Management / AutoFill - Save and restore the tab back/forward history (Qt 4.6) - Limit download progress updates to 5 per second to reduces CPU use from 18% to 3% - Allow urls to be dropped on the bookmark bar and bookmark menu - Lots of improvements and bug fixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Bump to latest stable * Add a patch to hide hidden files in directory listing, fix character encoding in directory listing - Add support for search keywords in the location bar - POST support for OpenSearch suggestion requests - Remember last used save directory - Significantly speed up the cookie dialog by keeping a cached copy of all the cookies - Lots of improvements and bug fixes
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Stable bump, remove tooltip patch as it's in upstream now
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Moved from Contrib to Pardus repository
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: -Bump to latest stable, fix deps for 2009 -Add tr.wikipedia to default search engines, patch to show tab titles as tooltips
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Stable bump with fix for qt4.5.1 cache bug
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Version bump, remove unneeded patches, respect CXX, add LICENSE as doc, add Pardus as homepage, update turkish
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Patch for getting true system locale at first run.
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Update.Comment: Turkish language file updated. Patches for Pardus bookmarks and desktop. Fix for package-manager icon issue
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: tweetdeck
Source.Summary: Adobe AIR software to Get live updates from your friends on Twitter and Facebook.
Source.Description: tweetdeck an is Get live updates from your friends on Twitter and Facebook as a Adobe AIR stand-alone application.

Source.Name: pidgin-facebookchat
Source.Description: Pidgin-Facebookchat is a Facebook chat plugin for Pidgin and libpurple messengers.
Pidgin-Facebookchat, Facebook üzerinden arkadaşlarınızla yazılı sohbet etmenize olanak sağlar.

Update.Comment: Stable update, compile from source, fix paths, add json-glib dependency
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: gyachi
Source.Description: GyachE Improved (GyachI) is a fork from Gyach Enhanced Yahoo! client for Linux operating systems. It supports almost all of the features you would expect to find on the official Windows Yahoo! client
GyachE Improved (GyachI), Gyach Enhanced Yahoo! istemcisi üzerinden geliştirilmiş bir Yahoo! istemcisidir. Resmi Windows Yahoo! istemcisinin nerdeyse bütün özelliklerini taşır.

Update.Comment: New stable release: enable wine for gyvoice, fix gpgme_header path and enable gpgme plugin, optimise actions.py
Update.Name: Mehmet Nur Olcay

Source.Name: pidgin-musictracker
Source.Summary: A plugin for Pidgin which displays the music track currently playing in your status
Dinlediğiniz müziği Pidgin'de gösteren bir eklenti
Source.Description: Musictracker is a plugin for Pidgin which displays the music track currently playing in your status. Currently supported players: Amarok, Rhythmbox, Audacious, XMMS, MPC/MPD, Exaile, Banshee, Quod Libet.
Musictracker, dinlediğiniz muziği durum bilgisi olarak Pidgin'de gösterir. Amarok, Rhythmbox, Audacious, XMMS, MPC/MPD, Exaile, Banshee ve Quod Libet uygulamalarını destekler.

Source.Name: vacuum
Source.Description: Vacuum is a modular, crossplatform Jabber client.
Vacuum, modüler ve çoklu platform desteğine sahip bir Jabber istemcisidir.
